src.core package

Submodules

src.core.config module

Configuration module for the AI Agent System.

This module handles loading and managing configuration settings for the entire system, including agent settings, memory configuration, and API credentials.

class src.core.config.MemoryConfig(*, conversation_buffer_size: int = 20, working_memory_capacity: int = 50, decay_rate: float = 0.95, episodic_importance_threshold: float = 0.7, semantic_update_frequency: str = 'daily', procedural_versioning: bool = True, vector_db: str = 'chroma', embedding_model: str = 'all-mpnet-base-v2', vector_db_path: Path = PosixPath('data/embeddings'), knowledge_graph_enabled: bool = True, knowledge_graph_uri: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

class src.core.config.AgentConfig(*, context_window_sizes: Dict[str, int] = {'data_engineer': 5000, 'ml_architect': 7000, 'ml_engineer': 6000, 'product_manager': 6000, 'qa_engineer': 5000, 'sw_architect': 7000, 'sw_engineer': 6000, 'team_leader': 8000}, summary_levels: int = 3, temperature: Dict[str, float] = {'data_engineer': 0.4, 'ml_architect': 0.5, 'ml_engineer': 0.3, 'product_manager': 0.7, 'qa_engineer': 0.2, 'sw_architect': 0.5, 'sw_engineer': 0.3, 'team_leader': 0.7}, model_versions: Dict[str, str] = {'data_engineer': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'ml_architect': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'ml_engineer': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'product_manager': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'qa_engineer': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'sw_architect': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'sw_engineer': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'team_leader': 'claude-3-5-sonnet'})[source]

class src.core.config.SystemConfig(*, project_name: str = 'polymind', debug_mode: bool = False, log_level: str = 'INFO', data_dir: Path = PosixPath('data'), memory: MemoryConfig = MemoryConfig(conversation_buffer_size=20, working_memory_capacity=50, decay_rate=0.95, episodic_importance_threshold=0.7, semantic_update_frequency='daily', procedural_versioning=True, vector_db='chroma', embedding_model='all-mpnet-base-v2', vector_db_path=PosixPath('data/embeddings'), knowledge_graph_enabled=True, knowledge_graph_uri=None), agents: AgentConfig = AgentConfig(context_window_sizes={'team_leader': 8000, 'product_manager': 6000, 'ml_architect': 7000, 'sw_architect': 7000, 'ml_engineer': 6000, 'sw_engineer': 6000, 'data_engineer': 5000, 'qa_engineer': 5000}, summary_levels=3, temperature={'team_leader': 0.7, 'product_manager': 0.7, 'ml_architect': 0.5, 'sw_architect': 0.5, 'ml_engineer': 0.3, 'sw_engineer': 0.3, 'data_engineer': 0.4, 'qa_engineer': 0.2}, model_versions={'team_leader': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'product_manager': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'ml_architect': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'sw_architect': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'ml_engineer': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'sw_engineer': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'data_engineer': 'claude-3-5-sonnet', 'qa_engineer': 'claude-3-5-sonnet'}), rag: RAGConfig = RAGConfig(top_k=5, similarity_threshold=0.7, reranking_enabled=True, knowledge_base_path=PosixPath('data/knowledge'), external_sources_enabled=False, external_sources=[]), domains: DomainConfig = DomainConfig(cv_enabled=True, cv_models_path=None, cv_default_image_size=(224, 224), nlp_enabled=True, nlp_models_path=None, nlp_max_sequence_length=512, tabular_enabled=True, tabular_models_path=None, tabular_default_metrics=['accuracy', 'f1', 'roc_auc']), api: APIConfig = APIConfig(anthropic_api_key='', anthropic_api_url='https://api.anthropic.com', openai_api_key=None, huggingface_api_key=None), mcp: MCPConfig = MCPConfig(enabled=True, server_name='polymind_mcp', server_version='0.1.0', tools_enabled=['analyze_requirements', 'design_ml_architecture', 'design_software_architecture', 'implement_ml_component', 'implement_code_component', 'design_data_pipeline', 'test_solution']))[source]

src.core.config.load_config(config_path: str | Path | None = None) → SystemConfig[source]

Load the system configuration.

Parameters:

config_path – Path to the configuration file. If None, uses default settings.

Returns:

The loaded configuration.

Return type:

SystemConfig

src.core.config.get_config() → SystemConfig[source]

Get the current system configuration.

Returns:

The current configuration.

Return type:

SystemConfig
